sentence: Monday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index .53 This is the 4th straight day of increase for the index.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 1.8 billion.
Declining stocks led advancers by 1.56 to 1 ratio.
There were 1135 advancers and 1771 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 64 stocks reached a 52 week high and 22 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed up .08% for the day; a total of 4.55 points.
Liberty Interactive Corporation ( QVCA ) had the largest percent change down (-2.3%) while NVIDIA Corporation ( NVDA ) had the largest percent change gain rising 3.19%.
The Dow Jones index closed down -.04% for the day; a total of -8.76 points.
Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change down (-1.2%) while Caterpillar, Inc. ( CAT ) had the largest percent change gain rising 2.68%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
